comments.content:
I've found this font from this link:  
 [http://images.allrecipes.com/site/allrecipes/pdfs/2009/guide\_to\_temps.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20101001224533/http:/images.allrecipes.com/site/allrecipes/pdfs/2009/guide_to_temps.pdf "http://images.allrecipes.com/site/allrecipes/pdfs/2009/guide\_to\_temps.pdf")  
This font looks familiar but not easy to recognize. Can anyone tell me what is this font?
[Blockhouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20101001224533/http:/www.houseind.com/search/?search=blockhouse) from House Industries. (If you check the PDF properties in Acrobat, it's listed there.)
